pullRequest.title: Identity Device Code , Client Certificate and VS Code Credential updates
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #11649
Resolves the VS code Docker Container Env Issue.
Fixes #16068
Applies the Device Code Credential consistency review feedback.
Fixes #16936
Applies the Client Certificate Credential consistency review feedback.

nodes.bodyText: Single sign on ID? This is the client ID of Azure CLI.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@

+
+package com.azure.identity.implementation.util;
+
+public class IdentityConstants {
+    /**
+     * The Single Sign On ID.
+     */
+    public static final String DEVELOPER_SINGLE_SIGN_ON_ID = "04b07795-8ddb-461a-bbee-02f9e1bf7b46";

nodes.bodyText: For internal consistency you should consider changing the name on the identityClientOptions too
I would expect all strings going into logs would refer to it as "VS Code"?
